p: The Global Biodiversity Information Facility has reported five H. arenarium subspecies with several synonyms listed in Table 2. On the other hand, Galbany-Casals et al. ( 2009) recognized only two subspecies arenarium and aucheri. Nevertheless, according to EMA ( 2015), most of Helichrysi flos from EU countries belong to H. arenarium subsp. arenarium subspecies.
